newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch closing debt market report.
newsitem.headline: Dutch closing debt market report.

text.p: Dutch bonds close a touch lower in quiet session on Thursday, but dealers say outlook remains good. Slightly lower bund futures pull guilder debt down, but some say futures seen heading up. June bund future contracts meeting resistance just above 101-level today but dealers expect prices to rise above this level in coming days. This would support Dutch bonds. Dutch yield curve seen flattening somewhat as prices in longer end expected to rise, which would press yields somewhat lower.
